title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Juvenile Delinquency Forms (Family Court Act Article 3), form 3-36 - Provisions for use where section 353.6 Family Court Act applies (restitution and services for the public good)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Juvenile Delinquency Forms (Family Court Act Article 3), form 3-36 - Provisions for use where section 353.6 Family Court Act applies (restitution and services for the public good)

State Regulations

Sec. 353.6 F.C.A. Form 3-36
(Juvenile Delinquency)
7/83
PROVISIONS FOR USE WHERE
SECTION 353.6 FAMILY COURT ACT
APPLIES
(Restitution and Services for the Public

Good)
(e) All pleadings, briefs or memor and a
which reproduce, paraphrase or disclose any documents which have previously
been designated by a party as comprising or containing Confidential Information
or "Highly Confidential - Attorney's Eyes-Only Information" shall identify such
documents by the production number ascribed to them at the time of
production. (ORDERED that Respondent perform services
for the public good, in that: ____________
____________
____________.)
(ORDERED that ________ supervise the
(restitution) (performance of services for the public good) ordered herein and
report to the court every ________.)
[FN1] Applicable in dispositions of
probation or conditional discharge. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Juvenile Delinquency

Forms (Family Court Act Article 3), form
3-36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
